hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT PRIVILEGE_ID, CREATED_BY, TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS CREATION_DATE, IS_ACTIVE, NAME, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS START_DATE, DESCRIPTION, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS END_DATE, PRIORITY, UPDATED_BY, TO_CHAR(UPDATED_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS UPDATED_DATE FROM SEC_PRIVILEGE WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy}

INSERT INTO SEC_PRIVILEGE ( PRIVILEGE_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, IS_ACTIVE, NAME, START_DATE, DESCRIPTION, END_DATE, PRIORITY, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( ${PRIVILEGE_ID}, ${CREATED_BY}, ${CREATION_DATE}, ${IS_ACTIVE}, ${NAME}, ${START_DATE}, ${DESCRIPTION}, ${END_DATE}, ${PRIORITY}, ${UPDATED_BY}, ${UPDATED_DATE} )

UPDATE SEC_PRIVILEGE SET CREATED_BY = ${CREATED_BY}, CREATION_DATE = ${CREATION_DATE}, IS_ACTIVE = ${IS_ACTIVE}, NAME = ${NAME}, START_DATE = ${START_DATE}, DESCRIPTION = ${DESCRIPTION}, END_DATE = ${END_DATE}, PRIORITY = ${PRIORITY}, UPDATED_BY = ${UPDATED_BY}, UPDATED_DATE = ${UPDATED_DATE} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
